name: pullquester
description: Issues a pull request using configuration files in your current repo.
author: Jonathan Park <https://github.com/park9140>, Sam Noedel <sam.noedel@gmail.com>, James Trinklein <https://github.com/jtrinklein>

scripts.version:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json && git commit -m 'version: updated by patch increment'
scripts.version:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package.json && git commit -m 'version: updated by minor increment'
scripts.version:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package.json && git commit -m 'version: updated by major increment'
